Language.Text:
Day Twenty Five.
I found the log of the expedition that came before us. I read about how they studied the Labyrinth, how they solved one maze after the other, how they searched for the Proteans. They were trying to discover the Labyrinth's heart for days, weeks, running out of supplies, falling into despair. They were so desperate that they tried to eat local plants. Unfortunately, side effects and wild nightmares took over, but also hope that the dreams are showing the way. The last entry described a discovery of maze-building machines. Interesting.
